__ecdsaWalletCreatedCallback(bytes32,byt.details: Required by IWalletOwner interface for WalletRegistry

__ecdsaWalletHeartbeatFailedCallback(byt.details: Required by IWalletOwner interface for WalletRegistry

devRequestNewWallet().details: This bypasses the walletOwner check - USE ONLY IN DEVELOPMENT      This function calls WalletRegistry.requestNewWallet() directly,      but since it's called from Bridge (the walletOwner), it will succeed

requestNewWallet().details: This is a convenience function for local development      In production, only the walletOwner should be able to call this

__ecdsaWalletCreatedCallback(bytes32,byt.notice: Callback function executed when a new wallet is created

__ecdsaWalletHeartbeatFailedCallback(byt.notice: Callback function executed when wallet heartbeat fails

devRequestNewWallet().notice: For development: Allows anyone to trigger requestNewWallet

requestNewWallet().notice: For development: Allows calling requestNewWallet on WalletRegistry

userdoc.notice: Minimal stub implementation of Bridge contract for local development
